name: Alex Wilson (@probablyfine@tech.lgbt)
summary:
All set up for Advent of Code tomorrow!

https://github.com/mrwilson/advent-of-code-2023

I'll be doing it using jq, but this time I've written a little test framework in rust on top of libjq (called jqunit, obviously) to make it easier to stage out the functionality in later, trickier puzzles.

I'll be tooting my progress on here, and posting my solutions each day.

#AdventOfCode
